intents.name: GeneralHealthSymptoms
intents.displayName: What are the symptoms of the flu?
trainingPhrases: What are the symptoms of the flu?
How do I know if I have the flu?

text: The flu typically includes symptoms such as fever, cough, sore throat, runny or stuffy nose, muscle or body aches, headaches, and fatigue. If you suspect you have the flu, it's important to consult with a healthcare provider.

intents.name: AppointmentScheduling
intents.displayName: How can I schedule an appointment with Dr. Smith?
trainingPhrases: How can I schedule an appointment with Dr. Smith?
I need to book an appointment with Dr. Smith

text: To schedule an appointment with Dr. Smith, you can visit our appointment scheduling page [link], call our office at [phone number], or use our online booking system [link].

intents.name: MedicationInformation
intents.displayName: What are the side effects of my medication?
trainingPhrases: What are the side effects of my medication?
Tell me the side effects of my medication
What should I expect from my medication?

text: For information about the side effects of your medication, please refer to the medication guide provided with your prescription or consult with your pharmacist or healthcare provider. You can also look up specific medications on reliable medical websites.

intents.name: InsuranceAndBilling
intents.displayName: What insurance plans do you accept?
trainingPhrases: What insurance plans do you accept?

text: We accept a variety of insurance plans. For a detailed list of accepted plans, please visit our insurance page [link] or contact our billing department at [phone number].

intents.name: MentalHealthSupport
intents.displayName: How can I manage anxiety effectively?
trainingPhrases: How can I manage anxiety effectively?

text: Managing anxiety can involve practices such as mindfulness, cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT), regular physical activity, and seeking support from a mental health professional. Itâ€™s important to find strategies that work for you and consult with a healthcare provider for personalized support.
